column4: Anybody willing to walk me through some wine setup? I'm running 32bit Ubuntu, Wine 1.3, and have done all the config changes mentioned in the community page but still suffer from significantly lower framerates than my windows install
hmmm.. have you tried disabling compiz (the desktop effects)? i know they can negatively effect 3D apps in wine
thanks for the tip, I'll give it a shot
no prob. other than that i don't know. i used to run ubuntu exclusively but got tired of wine's quirks for gaming, so im back on windows for now. by the way there is a wine channel too at #winehq
